short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the background of Notion pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Notion pages into visually stunning masterpieces with the Notion Prettier Chrome Extension! Our tool is designed to enhance the aesthetic appeal of your Notion content effortlessly. Whether you're managing projects, taking notes, or organizing your life, Notion Prettier will make your pages look more attractive and engaging.
